titleStmt.title: To the right honourable the Lord Maior, aldermen, and citizens, in Common-Councel assembled. The humble petition of the youngmen and apprentices of the city of London and the liberties thereof.

notesStmt.note: Annotations on Thomason copy: "presented to ye Common Counsell meeting at Night July In 12 1648"; "for which they had the thanks of the court".
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
